Registration

Greetings! This Year’s 5th Edition International Test Conference is going virtual and prices are greatly reduced like last year. Let us participate, learn and contribute.

Registration Fee Details:

Category
Tutorial and conference
Research Scholars, UG/PG Students (INR) **
1000/-
Faculty/Academicians & IEEE Members (INR)
1000/-
Authors / Presenters (INR)
1000/-
Industry Professionals (INR)
2000/-
Foreign Delegates (INR)
2000/-

Note:
            Attendees seeking fellowship (Only applicable to the students and faculties from University/schools) need not pay and register here instead reach out to Dr. Sreeranjani Rajendran or Dr. Sivanantham by sending an email to “ITC India <itctestweekindia@gmail.com>”
